trends: There have been 35 other sightings in St Petersburg
There were no other sightings in St Petersburg on or around May 2nd 2009
Summary: Metallic round, doughnut (center open), spinning from top to bottom.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving to work on Sat. May 2nd, noticed a very bright shiney light, it was a clear blue sky day. As I continued to observe the object I noticed that it wasn't any convential type of aircraft (because for the first minute or so that was what I was trying to identify it as). Then upon closer viewing notice it was rotating from top to bottom. It was apprx. 10-15K in altitude and about a quarter inch in size from my extended arm.
